amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for ICE--Operations and Support (Enforcement and Removal Operations) by $100,000,000 and increase funding for Coast Guard--Acquisition, Construction, and Improvements (cutters for drug interdiction) by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 76 printed in Part B of House Report 115-295 to reduce funding for ICE--Operations and Support (Enforcement and Removal Operations) by $100,000,000 and increase funding for Coast Guard--Acquisition, Construction, and Improvements (cutters for drug interdiction) by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Correa amendment (A040) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 229 (Roll no. 462).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Correa amendment (A040) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 229 (Roll no. 462).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A040) offered by Mr. Correa.
